vendor_name: Parc Beaumont Hôtel & Spa Pau - MGallery
title: South of France European Elegance with Onsite Dining, Spa & Indoor Pool
description:
Nestled on the edge of Parc Beaumont in the heart of Pau, this residence is a sanctuary of refined luxury and natural beauty. Overlooking the Pyrenees and lush gardens, and home to a sprawling pool and spa bathed in natural light, the perfect balance of relaxation and indulgence awaits.

When you're ready to explore, you're just moments from the Château de Pau, the birthplace of King Henry IV, and the Boulevard des Pyrénées, offering panoramic views of the mountains in the distance. Indulge in local gastronomy at the nearby Halles de Pau, a bustling food market brimming with regional produce.
location_description: Hôtel Parc Beaumont and Spa, Pau - MGallery
